title: Only my first game of the day is screwy.
body: Sorry if this has already been addressed but I couldn'tt find the thread. My first game of the day barely connects, if at all. After that however my games run normally. Does anybody have a similar issue or know why?

replies.body: Sounds like some instability with your connection, it's very possible that it may continue to degrade over time.  Start off with our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use it to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that's the culprit.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to clear up any potential snags will reaching the game server.  I hope that helps!
